players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is dead and I investigated Bob, who is the mafioso. We need to act fast."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found he is the mafioso. He should be questioned immediately to prevent further deaths."
Bob: "I am innocent. I didn't kill Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
